title: Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan breakdown how the Celtics were able to go into Miami and beat the Heat to advance to the NBA Finals.  NBA Analyst and former NBA champion Antonio Daniels joins Ryan and Doug to discuss the NBA Finals matchup, talk about the direction the game is going in, and to hit on other major NBA topics this holiday weekend.  Doug and Ryan get into the code of Fantasy Football. 

#douggottliebshow 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
